channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Access
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Access

item.title: CVE-2022-22311|2024-08-03T03:07:50.289Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access could allow a user, using man in the middle techniques, to obtain sensitive information or possibly change some information due to improper validiation of JWT tokens.

item.title: CVE-2022-22370|2024-08-03T03:14:54.990Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0, 10.0.1.0, 10.0.2.0, and 10.0.3.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 221194.

item.title: CVE-2021-20585|2024-08-03T17:45:44.369Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 20.07 could disclose sensitive information in HTTP server headers that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 199398.

item.title: CVE-2022-43740|2024-08-03T13:40:06.434Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access OIDC Provider could allow a remote user to cause a denial of service due to uncontrolled resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 238921.

item.title: CVE-2022-22464|2024-08-03T03:14:55.207Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 10.0.0.0, 10.0.1.0, 10.0.2.0, and 10.0.3.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 225081.

item.title: CVE-2022-43868|2024-08-03T13:40:06.872Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access OIDC Provider could disclose directory information that could aid attackers in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 239445.

item.title: CVE-2022-22463|2024-08-03T03:14:55.220Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 10.0.0.0, 10.0.1.0, 10.0.2.0, and 10.0.3.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 225079.

item.title: CVE-2022-36775|2024-08-03T10:14:28.496Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0, 10.0.1.0, 10.0.2.0, 10.0.3.0, and10.0.4.0 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. This could allow an attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 233576.

item.title: CVE-2021-20576|2024-08-03T17:45:44.699Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 20.07 could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted HTTP GET request that could cause the application to crash.

item.title: CVE-2021-20575|2024-08-03T17:45:44.459Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 20.07 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. X-Force ID: 199278.

item.title: CVE-2022-22465|2024-08-03T03:14:55.275Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 10.0.0.0, 10.0.1.0, 10.0.2.0, and 10.0.3.0 could allow a local user to obtain elevated privileges due to improper access permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 225082.

item.title: CVE-2023-30430|2024-08-02T14:21:44.771Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from trace logs. IBM X-Force ID: 252183.

item.title: CVE-2024-31883|2024-08-02T01:59:50.071Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1, under certain configurations, could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due to asymmetric resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 287615.

item.title: CVE-2024-31883|2024-06-27T17:23:32.454Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1, under certain configurations, could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due to asymmetric resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 287615.

item.title: CVE-2024-31883|2024-06-27T15:50:52.220Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1, under certain configurations, could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due to asymmetric resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 287615.

item.title: CVE-2023-30430|2024-06-27T15:53:23.648Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from trace logs. IBM X-Force ID: 252183.

item.title: CVE-2023-30430|2024-06-27T18:52:43.238Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from trace logs. IBM X-Force ID: 252183.
